attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Hemp was used for many things before it was made illegal. There is proof that THC can turn cancer neocrotic [Dead cells]. Smoking cannabis can cause your lungs to collapse amongst other dangerous side effects, but from taking a small dose of THC oil, one to two drops a day, cancer would be CURED.

How many people have lost love ones from this disease? Produce the cure and save the world.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
